VVitts nevv dyall: or, A schollers prize Sherley, Anthony, poet.
[100] p.
By W. W[hite] for Iohn Browne, Imprinted at London : 1604.
Dedication signed: Anthony Sherly. In verse. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-M⁴ N² . Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
